app.name: Lexikongo — Kikongo Dictionary
home.title: Lexikongo — Kikongo Dictionary
home.description: Online Kikongo dictionary: words, verbs, expressions, with translations in French and English, pronunciation and phonetics.
home.keywords: lexikongo, kikongo dictionary, kikongo french, kikongo english, kikongo lexicon, kikongo phonetics
verbs.index.title: Kikongo verbs
verbs.index.description: List of Kikongo verbs with their translation in French and English and their phonetic transcription.
verbs.index.keywords: kikongo verbs, kikongo conjugation, verb dictionary
verbs.detail.title: Kikongo verb: {verb}
verbs.detail.description: Definition, examples and translations of the Kikongo verb “{verb}” in French and English.
verbs.detail.keywords: kikongo verb {verb}, kikongo dictionary, kikongo conjugation
words.index.title: Kikongo words
words.index.description: Kikongo lexicon: words, meanings, translations in French and English, and phonetics.
words.index.keywords: kikongo words, kikongo vocabulary, kikongo lexicon
words.detail.title: Kikongo word: {word}
words.detail.description: Definition and translations of the Kikongo word “{word}” in French and English.
words.detail.keywords: kikongo word {word}, kikongo dictionary, kikongo vocabulary
expressions.index.title: Kikongo expressions
expressions.index.description: Idiomatic expressions and useful phrases in Kikongo with translations in French and English.
expressions.index.keywords: kikongo expressions, kikongo phrases, kikongo conversation
login.title: Login
login.description: Log in to manage your profile and contribute to the dictionary.
register.title: Sign up
register.description: Create an account to contribute to the Lexikongo dictionary.
profile.title: My profile
profile.description: View and update your Lexikongo account information.

hero.subtitle: Kikongo · French · English dictionary with phonetics. A living resource to learn, explore and contribute to the Kikongo linguistic heritage.

contribute.title: Contribute to the lexicon
contribute.body: Add new words, verbs or expressions and help the community enrich the database.

login.title: Log in
login.body: Access your dashboard, your submissions and your activity.

seo.title: Lexikongo — Kikongo · French · English Dictionary
seo.description: Lexikongo is an online Kikongo · French · English dictionary with phonetics. Explore Kikongo words, verbs and expressions and help preserve the language.
seo.ogDescription: A modern resource to discover, practice and transmit the Kikongo language: words, verbs, expressions and phonetics.

lastExpressions.error: Impossible de récupérer les dernières contributions.

words.list.title: Word list
words.list.subtitle: Browse Kikongo words with their plural form, phonetics, and translations in French and English.
words.list.count: {n} word in the database | {n} words in the database

words.list.empty: No words found at the moment.
words.list.caption: Each row shows a Kikongo word in singular and plural form, its phonetic transcription, and its translations in French and English.

page.title: Discover Kikongo words
page.subtitle: Browse Kikongo words with their plurals, phonetic transcription, and translations into French and English. Built and enriched by the community.

meta.title: List of Kikongo words – Lexikongo
meta.description: Discover the list of Kikongo words with their plural forms, phonetic transcriptions, and translations into French and English.

verbs.list.subtitle.suffix: of the infinitive, their phonetics, and their translations into French and English.

verbs.list.caption: Each row shows a Kikongo verb in the infinitive (with ku), its phonetic transcription, and its translations into French and English.
verbs.list.rowAria: View details for the verb ku {verb}
expressions.list.title: All expressions
expressions.list.subtitle: Browse at a glance the words and verbs in Kikongo, with their phonetics and translations into French and English.

expressions.list.caption: Each row represents either a word or a verb in Kikongo, with its phonetic transcription and its translations into French and English.

expressions.cards.subtitle: Browse Kikongo words and verbs at a glance, with their phonetics and their translations into French and English.

page.title: Verb list
page.subtitle: Browse Kikongo verbs with their phonetic transcription and translations into French and English. Perfect for learning, revision and teaching material.
page.ctaTitle: Can’t find the verb you are looking for?
page.ctaText: Help enrich the lexicon by contributing new Kikongo verbs with their translations and usage examples. Every contribution helps the community learn and pass on the language.

meta.title: Kikongo verb list – Lexikongo
meta.description: Explore Kikongo verbs with their phonetics and translations into French and English. A useful tool for learning and teaching the language.

page.title: Kikongo words and verbs list
page.subtitle: Browse Kikongo words and verbs from the Lexikongo database, with their phonetic transcription and translations into French and English.
page.listSubtitle: An overview of all Kikongo word and verb entries currently available in the Lexikongo dictionary.
page.bottomCtaTitle: Can’t find the expression you’re looking for?
page.bottomCtaText: Help enrich the lexicon by adding new Kikongo words or verbs with their translations and usage examples.

meta.description: Discover the full list of Kikongo words and verbs with their phonetics and translations into French and English.

login.title: Log in

meta.title: Log in · Lexikongo
meta.description: Log in to your Lexikongo account to contribute to the Kikongo dictionary, manage your entries and find your favourites.

login.pageTitle: Log in to your Lexikongo account
login.heroDescription: Log in to suggest Kikongo words, verbs and expressions, track your contributions and find your favourites.
login.sideAria: Login form and access to your Lexikongo space
login.metaSecurity: Your email address is only used to manage your account and activate your Lexikongo profile.
login.sideBenefit1: Continue contributing to the Kikongo dictionary.
login.sideBenefit2: Review the history of your additions and edits.
login.subtitle: Log in to access your Lexikongo space.

error.generic: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

meta.title: Sign up · Lexikongo
meta.description: Create your Lexikongo account to suggest Kikongo words, verbs and expressions, and keep track of your contributions.

register.intro: Join the Lexikongo community to contribute to the dictionary and save your favourites.
register.emailConfirmHint: After signing up, you will receive an email with a confirmation link. Your account will be activated once you click it.
register.title: Sign up
register.subtitle: Create your account to access your Lexikongo space.
register.loginLink: Already have an account? Log in
register.success: Sign up successful! Please check your inbox to activate your account.

error.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields.
error.generic: An error occurred while creating your account. Please try again.

profile.title: User profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your Lexikongo account information.
profile.sideAria: Account summary, roles and shortcuts for the Lexikongo dictionary

meta.title: User profile | Lexikongo
meta.description: View and manage your Lexikongo account information (profile, roles and security).
meta.ogDescription: Lexikongo member area: profile, roles and account information.

profile.metaSecurity: Your personal information remains private and is never shared.

account.title: Account information
account.subtitle: These details come from your current Lexikongo account.
account.usernameHint: This name may appear next to any public contributions you make.
account.emailHint: We only use it for login and security purposes.

roles.title: Roles and permissions
roles.subtitle: Roles determine what you can do on Lexikongo.

security.title: Account security
security.subtitle: Protect your account with a strong, unique password.

user.desc: Can browse the dictionary and use search tools.

contributor.desc: Can suggest new Kikongo words, verbs and expressions.

admin.desc: Can manage users, content and dictionary configuration.

delete.title: Delete my account
delete.message: This action is permanent. Your Lexikongo account and its associated information will be deleted. This operation cannot be undone.
delete.success: Your account has been successfully deleted.
delete.error: An error occurred while deleting your account. Please try again.

hero.description: Access Lexikongo admin tools: words, verbs, users and submissions.
hero.meta: You only see information reserved to your administrator role here.

access.intro: Quick links to dictionary areas and account management.

words.text: Browse, filter and edit dictionary word entries.

verbs.text: Browse, filter and edit registered verbs.

users.text: List and manage user accounts (roles, access, deletion).

submissions.text: Approve or reject new word, verb and expression proposals.

session.text: You are signed in with an administrator account.

seo.description: Lexikongo admin dashboard: manage words, verbs and user accounts.

add.seoDescription: Admin dashboard · add a Kikongo word (form, nominal class, phonetics, translations).

hero.description: Suggest new Kikongo words, verbs and expressions and track your contributions.
hero.meta: Every contribution is reviewed before publication to preserve the dictionary’s quality.

actions.title: Contribute to the dictionary
actions.intro: Choose what you want to propose or improve on Lexikongo.

words.title: Suggest a word
words.text: Add a new Kikongo word with its translation and phonetics.

submissions.title: Manage your contributions
submissions.text: See all the words and verbs you have submitted, and update or complete them.

verbs.title: Suggest a verb
verbs.text: Add a new verb or suggest a better conjugation.

expressions.title: Suggest an expression
expressions.text: Share idiomatic expressions, proverbs or frequent turns of phrase.

doc.title: Read the documentation
doc.text: Learn how to structure your proposals and follow best practices.

summary.title: Your account summary
summary.intro: Key information related to your profile.

seo.title: Contributor area – Lexikongo
seo.description: Suggest and track your contributions in the Lexikongo Kikongo dictionary.

addWord.title: Submit a new word
addWord.subtitle: Add a Kikongo word with its noun class and its translations into French and/or English.

sections.translationsHint: Add at least one translation in French or English.

plural.label: Plural
plural.hint: Leave empty if the word has no specific plural form.

phonetic.label: Phonetics
phonetic.hint: You can indicate an approximate pronunciation (IPA or simple notation).

classId.label: Noun class
classId.hint: Choose or enter the noun class associated with this word.

actions.cancel: Cancel and go back to the contributor area

errors.classIdInvalid: The noun class must be a valid identifier.
errors.translationsRequired: Add at least one translation in French or English.
errors.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to submit a word.

messages.success: Your submission has been saved. Thank you for your contribution!
messages.errorGeneric: An error occurred while submitting the word.

addVerb.title: Submit a new verb
addVerb.subtitle: Add a Kikongo verb with its root, possible derived forms and translations into French and/or English.

sections.translationsHint: Add at least one translation in French or English.

root.label: Root
root.hint: For example, the base of the verb without prefixes or suffixes.

suffix.label: Suffix
suffix.hint: Leave empty if the verb has no specific suffix.

phonetic.label: Phonetics
phonetic.hint: You can indicate an approximate pronunciation (IPA or simple notation).

flags.label: Verb type
flags.hint: Check “derived verb” if this verb is formed from another one.

derivedFrom.label: Source verb (if derived)
derivedFrom.placeholder: ID or reference of the source verb
derivedFrom.hint: Optional: specify the verb from which this one is derived (ID or internal code, if known).

derivedVerbType.label: Derivation type
derivedVerbType.placeholder: ID or type of derived verb
derivedVerbType.hint: Optional: specify the type of derivation (causative, reciprocal, etc.) if you know it.

actions.cancel: Cancel and go back to the contributor area

errors.translationsRequired: Add at least one translation in French or English.
errors.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to submit a verb.

messages.success: Your submission has been saved. Thank you for your contribution!
messages.errorGeneric: An error occurred while submitting the verb.

hero.title: Your contributions
hero.subtitle: View all the words and verbs you have submitted to Lexikongo.
hero.meta: Pending contributions can be edited or deleted until they are reviewed and validated.

seo.title: Your contributions – Lexikongo
seo.description: View and manage your contributions (words and verbs) in the Lexikongo dictionary.

words.title: Submitted words
words.intro: List of the words you have submitted to the dictionary.
words.empty: You have not submitted any word yet.
words.error: Unable to fetch your submitted words.
words.caption: List of words submitted by the contributor.

verbs.title: Submitted verbs
verbs.intro: List of the verbs you have submitted to the dictionary.
verbs.empty: You have not submitted any verb yet.
verbs.error: Unable to fetch your submitted verbs.
verbs.caption: List of verbs submitted by the contributor.

messages.deleteConfirmWord: Do you really want to delete the word “{word}”? This action cannot be undone.
messages.deleteConfirmVerb: Do you really want to delete the verb “{verb}”? This action cannot be undone.
messages.deleteSuccessWord: The word contribution has been deleted.
messages.deleteSuccessVerb: The verb contribution has been deleted.
messages.deleteError: An error occurred while deleting the contribution.
